description: Details required by condition 4 (submission of (a) sample panels of all facing materials, brickwork or stonework showing the proposed colour, texture, facebond, and pointing to be used on the external faces of the school building; (b) samples of materials and detailed drawings (at Scale 1:50) of all fenestration, including surrounds, panelling, framing and glazing details, balustrades and balconies (including all terraces)) of planning permission 18/06079 (Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission 18/01168 for amendments to approved scheme involving the relocation of the existing Treverton Estate Residents Ballcourt and Playground (or 'MUGA') to an alternative location within the site.)
